# FitBenchmark Problem
software = 'Mantid'
name = 'WISH17701 panel 103 tube 3 calibration, peak 3'
description = 'An example of tube calibration for the WISH instrument'
input_file = 'WISH17701_calibration_panel103_tube3.txt'
function = 'name=LinearBackground,A0=5267,A1=0;name=Gaussian,Height=25353,PeakCentre=155.512,Sigma=1'
fit_ranges = {'x': [140.51249415300001, 170.51249415300001]}
